Travelers Guide:
I repeat to you again.
You must destroy Eye of Flind , Splendor Claw , Lightning of Flind , Splendor Blade , Wisdom of Flind, Pilgrim's Apprentice , Page's Pilgrim , Angry Splendor , Spirit of Flind, Splendor Pilgrim , Winner of Flind, Splendor Avenger , Wrangler of Flind, Splendor Alliance , Sign of Flind, Crown of Splendor , Judge of Fire , Judge of Light , Fang of Flind, Wailing of Splendor and Splendor supreme arbiter , collect 20 Bereavement Light Souls and take them High Priest Agripelyu in Rune . To make the task time for you to go to the Valley of Saints. You all right? Long live the journey!
